data.name: Movie Edit Pro 2015 - Movie Templates
data.detailed_description: Get your recordings ready for Hollywood with the Movie Wizard and the included animated movie templates. Choose your favorites from a variety of styles and categories, such as vacation, party or New Year's Eve. Each of the 30 movie templates include placeholders for your videos, photos and texts, which you can use to customize your movie.
data.about_the_game: Get your recordings ready for Hollywood with the Movie Wizard and the included animated movie templates. Choose your favorites from a variety of styles and categories, such as vacation, party or New Year's Eve. Each of the 30 movie templates include placeholders for your videos, photos and texts, which you can use to customize your movie.
data.short_description: Get your recordings ready for Hollywood with the Movie Wizard and the included animated movie templates.
data.supported_languages:
German*, English*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch*, Finnish, Russian, Swedish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual core processor with 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard, minimum resolution 1024 x 768
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Internal sound card
